# Echo

Send a message (text body) to someone else on behalf of the bot.


| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| recipient | Phone number of the recipient. |



`````{tabs}

````{tab} Sample Text

```text
app: echo
options: recipient = 12223334455

What's up.
```
````

````{tab} Sample Response

```text
The following message was sent to 12223334455:

What's up.
```
````
`````
